Articles.Content:
I heard some old folk tale that Jeb cannot be scared... apprently hitting the surface of Eve at ~50m/s rustled his jimmies.

This was after a successful landing, I tried to take off and parachute back down, only to lose my parachute. I used the last 2 pixels of fuel to slow down best I could to preserve the ship.

Challenge is simple, scare Jeb. Scoring doesn't matter, but Bob and Bill will pay you back that 20 Kerbits you bet them.

Successful Scares:

-Gamah

SargeRho

Edited September 22, 2012 by -Gamah
Rocketplane exploded on ascent...cockpit magically survived.
Pfft. Jebediah is worried only because he noticed the fun is now over.
